summary: This bill, the Expanding Access to Family Planning Act (S.1394), proposes to establish a Title X Clinic Fund within the Department of Health and Human Services to increase funding for family planning services. The bill appropriates significant funds from 2026-2035 for grants, contracts, and infrastructure improvements (construction and renovation) of Title X clinics. It also outlines requirements for subawards, prohibiting restrictions on entities providing services, and mandates nondirective pregnancy counseling, offering information on all options including prenatal care, infant care/adoption, and pregnancy termination.
